name: Mamegoma: Yoiko Maruiko Genkinako!
description: 'Mamegoma: Yoiko Maruiko Genkinako!' (otherwise known as まめゴマ よいこ まるいこ げんきなこ!) is a virtual pet simulation title for the Nintendo 3DS. Released in Japan on April 26th, 2012, it is based on a seal toy brand of the same name ('Mamegoma'), which is managed by San-X. It is the first of two titles made for the Nintendo 3DS.
